@JuliaChidley @ShropCouncil @EnvAgencyMids Hi Julia I’ll pass this onto our duty team.

@dikesmarshfarm @tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast @CanalRiverTrust Apparently the bottom of the canal has burst where it goes over a culvert? Don’t know yet if this is correct. 
I’ve heard of this happening in the past and using round bales to try and stem the flow. Throwing them in and letting the suction draw them into the hole.
@tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast Oh dear not good
@tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast It's hard to believe that the canal has burst! But I don't know how much work @CanalRiverTrust put into protecting its assets🤷‍♂️
